duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the SAP PM Asset Registry and execute data management activities with teamwork and communication skills.
Collect and enter required data for Functional Locations and Equipment, following industry rules and data standards for consistency.
Ensure all regulatory requirements are met, process material transfers, and perform self-regulated data audits to ensure data quality.
Monitor data quality dashboard, communicate with superintendents and foremen, and establish trusted relationships to keep SAP PM data evergreen.
Perform equipment data inventory at field locations.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent; Bachelor's degree in applicable field preferred
